Reviews.Title: A Starter touchscreen "semi"smart phone
Reviews.Author: Ullas Bhai "Novo Reveuaxeur"
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my dad, this was his first smart phone and he has been very happy so far.So I will try to caution you that this one is actually a "starter" phone.Who should not think about buying this:a) If you  have by any chance used an iphone or another smartphoneb) If you frequently use your phone for emailing or other official workc) If you are a big multimedia fan viz watching games or streaming movies etc.Pros:a. Very sleek, light weightb. Beautiful , and look good fashion accessoryc. If it is for a person who might need to use this to occasionally use the internet viz an occasional email or , get an address, or look up a restaurant etc.... it does the trickCons:a. Slow processorb. less responsive touchscreenc. not the most intuitive or user friendly phoned. Sound and ringtones are not too loud, if you work/live in a busy placeIn a nut shell, this is a great phone, but as the old adage goes "there are no free lunches", so you get more than what you pay for, a good started touchscreen semi smart phone. But this is no iphone, nor an alternative for a "real" smart phone
